thread.section_title: Pavillon Nation - UPDATED 2016 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Jeff klein
thread.title_full: Jeff klein - Review of Pavillon Nation, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Bonnie123454
title: Jeff klein
text:
Stayed one night in the hotel. Room clean , breakfast plenty and staff on desk very friendly. Especially the Eastern European lady who couldn't have been any more helpful
I was there as a dear friend had passed away and I came to his funeral.
I'd be very happy to go again. At the price my agent in london had agreed it was a joy to be there. And locally a great restaurant "Cafe Chez Prosper "
This is a must to eat at
